PROJECT 
• Dos Attack Detection Under Quic Protocol Using Machine Learning 
(research project) 
There is much research done in the field of detecting DDoS attacks on TCP, UDP, and ICMP like
protocols but no research done to detect DDoS attacks on QUIC protocol. Therefore, we aim to train a
machine learning based model to detect DDoS attacks under the QUIC protocol 
 
• Uni Buddy - Student Helper System 
Technologies: EJS | Node.js - Express | MySQL 
This software solution is for University students common 3 problems. This system is to help the
students with money management, making Task Lists with sub-task, and saving notes. 
 
• Course Approval And Exam Approval System 
(group project) 
Technologies: React | Node.js - Express | MongoDB

students with money management, making Task Lists with sub-task, and saving notes. 
 
• Course Approval And Exam Approval System

This app focuses on course registration, exam registration, course approval, and exam approval for
FOE UOJ
